mapper.select: SELECT /* selectReportList */ VOTE_SEQ, VOTE_REMARKS, VOTE_FILEPATH, VOTE_FILENAME, REG_DATE, REAL_SEQ FROM RYHR.RYHCF09MT WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY VOTE_SEQ
SELECT /* selectVote */ VOTE_SABUN, TO_CHAR(VOTE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VOTE_DATE FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT WHERE 1=1 AND VOTE_SABUN = #{voteSabun}
mapper.insert: INSERT /* insertVote */ INTO RYHR.RYHCF10MT ( VOTE_SABUN, VOTE_DATE, VOTE_N01, VOTE_N02, VOTE_N03, VOTE_N04, VOTE_N05, VOTE_N06, VOTE_N07, VOTE_N08, VOTE_N09, VOTE_N10, VOTE_N11, VOTE_N12, VOTE_N13, VOTE_N14, VOTE_N15, VOTE_N16, VOTE_N17, VOTE_N18, VOTE_N19, VOTE_N20, VOTE_N21, VOTE_N22, VOTE_N23, VOTE_N24, VOTE_N25, VOTE_N26, VOTE_N27, VOTE_N28, VOTE_N29, VOTE_N30, VOTE_N31, VOTE_N32, VOTE_N33, VOTE_N34, VOTE_N35, VOTE_N36, VOTE_N37, VOTE_N38, VOTE_N39, VOTE_N40, VOTE_N41, VOTE_N42, VOTE_N43, VOTE_N44, VOTE_N45, VOTE_N46, VOTE_N47, VOTE_N48 ) VALUES ( #{voteSabun}, SYSDATE, #{voteN01}, #{voteN02}, #{voteN03}, #{voteN04}, #{voteN05}, #{voteN06}, #{voteN07}, #{voteN08}, #{voteN09}, #{voteN10}, #{voteN11}, #{voteN12}, #{voteN13}, #{voteN14}, #{voteN15}, #{voteN16}, #{voteN17}, #{voteN18}, #{voteN19}, #{voteN20}, #{voteN21}, #{voteN22}, #{voteN23}, #{voteN24}, #{voteN25}, #{voteN26}, #{voteN27}, #{voteN28}, #{voteN29}, #{voteN30}, #{voteN31}, #{voteN32}, #{voteN33}, #{voteN34}, #{voteN35}, #{voteN36}, #{voteN37}, #{voteN38}, #{voteN39}, #{voteN40}, #{voteN41}, #{voteN42}, #{voteN43}, #{voteN44}, #{voteN45}, #{voteN46}, #{voteN47}, #{voteN48} )
mapper.select: SELECT /* selectNotParticipationList */ A.SABUN SABUN, C.SAUP_NM SAUP, B.DEPT_NAME DEPT, D.POS_LOG POS, A.KNAME FROM RYHR.RYHZZ01MT A INNER JOIN RYHR.RYHZZ02MT B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RYACC.RYAZZ03MT C ON A.SAUP_CD1||A.SAUP_CD2 = C.SAUP_CD INNER JOIN RYHR.RYHAA20MT D ON A.POSIT_CD = D.POSIT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(A.RETIRE_DAY,'99991231') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.SABUN NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT(VOTE_SABUN) FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT) ORDER BY C.SAUP_NM, B.DEPT_NAME, A.KNAME

SELECT /* selectParticipationList */ B.SABUN SABUN, D.SAUP_NM SAUP, C.DEPT_NAME DEPT, E.POS_LOG POS, B.KNAME, TO_CHAR(A.VOTE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') VOTE_DATE FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT A INNER JOIN RYHR.RYHZZ01MT B ON A.VOTE_SABUN = B.SABUN INNER JOIN RYHR.RYHZZ02MT C ON B.DEPT_CODE = C.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RYACC.RYAZZ03MT D ON B.SAUP_CD1||B.SAUP_CD2 = D.SAUP_CD INNER JOIN RYHR.RYHAA20MT E ON B.POSIT_CD = E.POSIT_CD WHERE 1=1 AND NVL(B.RETIRE_DAY,'99991231') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY A.VOTE_DATE DESC

WITH VOTE_STATISTICS AS ( /* selectVoteStatistics */ SELECT '1' VOTE_SEQ, SUM(VOTE_N01) VOTE_SUM, AVG(VOTE_N01) VOTE_AVG, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N01,'5','1')) CNT5, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N01,'4','1')) CNT4, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N01,'3','1')) CNT3, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N01,'2','1')) CNT2, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N01,'1','1')) CNT1 FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT UNION ALL SELECT '2' VOTE_SEQ, SUM(VOTE_N02) VOTE_SUM, AVG(VOTE_N02) VOTE_AVG, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N02,'5','1')) CNT5, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N02,'4','1')) CNT4, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N02,'3','1')) CNT3, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N02,'2','1')) CNT2, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N02,'1','1')) CNT1 FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT UNION ALL SELECT '3' VOTE_SEQ, SUM(VOTE_N03) VOTE_SUM, AVG(VOTE_N03) VOTE_AVG, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N03,'5','1')) CNT5, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N03,'4','1')) CNT4, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N03,'3','1')) CNT3, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N03,'2','1')) CNT2, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N03,'1','1')) CNT1 FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT UNION ALL SELECT '4' VOTE_SEQ, SUM(VOTE_N04) VOTE_SUM, AVG(VOTE_N04) VOTE_AVG, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N04,'5','1')) CNT5, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N04,'4','1')) CNT4, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N04,'3','1')) CNT3, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N04,'2','1')) CNT2, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N04,'1','1')) CNT1 FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT UNION ALL SELECT '5' VOTE_SEQ, SUM(VOTE_N05) VOTE_SUM, AVG(VOTE_N05) VOTE_AVG, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N05,'5','1')) CNT5, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N05,'4','1')) CNT4, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N05,'3','1')) CNT3, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N05,'2','1')) CNT2, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N05,'1','1')) CNT1 FROM RYHR.RYHCF10MT UNION ALL SELECT '6' VOTE_SEQ, SUM(VOTE_N06) VOTE_SUM, AVG(VOTE_N06) VOTE_AVG, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N06,'5','1')) CNT5, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N06,'4','1')) CNT4, AVG(VOTE_N07) VOTE_AVG, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N07,'5','1')) CNT5, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N07,'4','1')) CNT4, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N07,'3','1')) CNT3, COUNT(DECODE(VOTE_N07,'2','1')) CNT2, B.REAL_SEQ, B.VOTE_FILEPATH, B.VOTE_FILENAME, A.VOTE_SUM, ROUND(A.VOTE_AVG, 2) VOTE_AVG, A.CNT5, A.CNT4, A.CNT3, A.CNT2, A.CNT1 FROM VOTE_STATISTICS A INNER JOIN RYHR.RYHCF09MT B ON A.VOTE_SEQ = B.VOTE_SEQ
